title: The Four Feathers
description: British guardsman Harry Feversham stuns his friends when, just before he is scheduled to ship off to the Sudan, he quits his regiment. In shocked retaliation for this dastardly act of cowardice, Harry is presented with four one from each of his three closest regimental friends and the fourth-and the most devastating-from his fianc√©e.Determined to prove his bravery-and to clear his name-Harry embarks for the Sudan. In search of service . . . and of honor.
author: A.E.W. Mason
